name: Sacrifice (itch) (Rafiki)
description:
A platformer prototype done for school.

Controls (keyboard/ xbox controller):

-Arrows/ Left Joystick: Move

-Space / A: Jump

-Ctrl/ X: Use spirit attack (see below)

Notes:

-To use the spirit attack, you need to first take damages. Every time you get hit, you get one spirit attack, and you lose it when you use it (like ammunition). You lose them as soon as you touch a checkpoint and heal.

-This is not 100% clear, but you bleed from the back. You have to fill the chalices; so sometimes, you'll have to turn around in mid-air to make sure to bleed in the right direction. 

As per usual, I did the programming. I helped refine the level design a bit.
